title: SCP-CN-1463
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start]]

**SCP-CN-1463：**化猫为娘，福生祸焉？

**作者：**[[*user CaroyalKKaia]]

感谢来自[[*user DouglasLiu]]，[[*user YUANNN]]，[[*user Bikii Lue]]的指导！

----
[[span style="font-family:'楷体';"]]花开堪折直须折，莫待无花空折枝。[[/span]]
